topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558ed2f363687206f00000bc#post_558ed2f363687206f00000bc
youre missing my point big time

I DONT strictly rely on others opinions at all i just look up others opinions to see what others thought of something and then draw my own conclusion, like i said before theyre good for REFERENCE and to UNDERSTAND BOTH SIDES as well as INFLUENCE towards your own opinions, theres a difference between strictly relying on something and using it as a mild reference

a lot of people praise The Matrix and District 9 as masterpieces but i hated both of those movies

Tamala 2010 had gotten a low score but i still really liked it
